content:
Absolutely! Here are some recommendations for albums and songs by these three bassists:

Esperanza Spalding:
- "Chamber Music Society" (2010)
- "Emily's D+Evolution" (2016)
- "I Know You Know" 
- "Judas" 
- "Little Fly" 

Christian McBride:
- "Gettin' to It" (1995)
- "Number Two Express" (1996)
- "Live at Tonic" (2006)
- "Blues for Duane" 
- "In a Hurry" 

John Patitucci:
- "Heart of the Bass" (1992)
- "Line by Line" (2006)
- "Brother to Brother" (2010)
- "Double Vision" (2012)
- "On the Corner" 

I hope you enjoy listening to these talented bassists!
